headline: 3 'out-of-favor' stocks that could have a comeback next year
summary: Markets have had a volatile 2025, with news-driven stock names fueling moves. Powers Advisory Group managing partner Matt Powers says now is the time to buy beat-up names that have strong dividend growth and low payout ratios that could be poised for a turnaround. Powers highlights three discretionary plays that he thinks fit the bill: Lennar (LEN), Williams-Sonoma (WSM), and Tractor Supply Company (TSCO). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.
